API/headers/process/get_info.h File Reference

#include <process/process_info.h>
#include <syscall/syscall.h>

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

int getProcessID (unsigned int iter)
 This function allows a program to request the ID of the program at position n on the scheduler.
process_info_t getProcessInfo (int pid)
 This function allows a program to request information on a another process. The information is returned in the process_info_t structure through the syscall API.

Function Documentation

int getProcessID ( unsigned int  iter  ) 

This function allows a program to request the ID of the program at position n on the scheduler.

Parameters:
The id of a process on the scheduler
Returns:
the process ID of that process if it exists. otherwise -1
process_info_t getProcessInfo ( int  pid  ) 

This function allows a program to request information on a another process. The information is returned in the process_info_t structure through the syscall API.

Parameters:
The process ID of the function to get info from
Returns:
process_info_t with information on the process if it exists. otherwise a blank process_info_t structure
